text: On that Day, mankind shall issue forth in separate groups (to be shown their deeds).He said:Each person will be [made to] follow whatever he used to depend upon. Whoever depended upon God�s favour (faḍl) will follow His favour. Whoever depended on his [own] works will follow his works. Whoever depended on intercession (shafāʿa) will follow the intercession.His words, Exalted is He:
